Creators.ConcatDisplayName: Nur al-Din `Abd al-Rahman ibn Ahmad Jami (Persian, died 898 AH/AD 1492)

Description: On this folio from Walters manuscript W.646, Joseph, having prayed to God to restore Zulaykha's beauty and being directed by God to marry her, orders a priest to prepare the marriage ceremony.
Keywords: Islamic; Mughal; Persian; Book; Codex; Illumination; Illustration; Manuscript; India; Literature -- Poetry
Medium: ink and pigments on laid paper
Provenance: Muhammad Vali Mirza [date and mode of acquisition unknown] [fol.1a: Muhammad Vali Mirza]; Court librarian Mirza Baba, 1821 (?) [mode of acquisition unknown] [acquisition note on fol. 1a: made in Dar al-'Ibadah Yazd, dated Ramadan 1236 AH/AD 1821 and signed by the court librarian Mirza Baba; underneath a seal: 'Abduh Jahangir, 118[0](?) AH/AD 1766-1767]; Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Title: Joseph Orders a Priest to Prepare the Marriage Ceremony
